title: Horseshoe Bend National Military Park: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     For Kids              For Kids            The Horseshoe Bend National Military Park junior ranger program is avaliable for visitors to the park.  It will take approximately 90 minutes to complete. Horseshoe Bend NMP offers a series of special childrenâ€™s camps during the summer months. Check Special Events to learn more.
